Episodes.Title: Uno
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy works his magic in the courtroom. Unexpected inspiration leads him to an unconventional pursuit of potential clients.
Episodes.GuestStars: Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos, Miriam Colon, Eileen Fogarty, Steven Levine, Daniel Spenser Levine, Raymond Cruz, Nadine Marissa, Sarah Minnich

Episodes.Title: Mijo
Episodes.Plot: As his troubles escalate to a boiling point, Jimmy finds himself in dire straits. An act of carelessness puts Chuck at risk.
Episodes.GuestStars: Raymond Cruz, Miriam Colon, Eileen Fogarty, Jamie Luner, Daniel Spenser Levine, Steven Levine, Jesus Jr., Cesar Garcia, Peter Diseth

Episodes.Title: Nacho
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy pulls out all the stops to prove that his dangerous client is innocent, even though it causes some friction with Kim.

Episodes.Title: Hero
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy conjures up a bold plan to solicit new clients, but has to face the consequences when the scheme strains his relationships with a rival firm.

Episodes.Title: Alpine Shepherd Boy
Episodes.Plot: When his efforts to drum up new business are interrupted by alarming news, Jimmy is pressured to make a difficult choice.

Episodes.Title: Five-O
Episodes.Plot: Mike's tragic past comes back to haunt him, and he's forced to seek help from an unusual source. Meanwhile, Jimmy's moral compass is put to the test.

Episodes.Title: Bingo
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy meets with potential new clients. When given the opportunity to do the right thing, Jimmy cashes in a favor from an unlikely ally.

Episodes.Title: RICO
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy shows Chuck that he's willing to do almost anything to win a case, even if it means getting his hands dirty.

Episodes.Title: Pimento
Episodes.Plot: Chuck urges Jimmy to accept a harsh truth. Meanwhile, a deal threatens to go off the rails when Mike's ability to complete a job is called into question.

Episodes.Title: Marco
Episodes.Plot: In the aftermath of recent events, Jimmy seizes an opportunity to reconnect with an old friend. Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.
